privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.introduction: Your privacy big deal to us. This Privacy Policy explain how CARITAS HopeLine take collect, use, and protect your information.

collection.title: Information Collection
collection.description: We collect information wey you give us directly, like your name, phone number, and location when you register or ask for help.

usage.title: How We Use Information
usage.description: Information dey used to coordinate emergency response, give transit spaces for IDP camps, and make our humanitarian work better.

sharing.title: Information Sharing
sharing.description: We share your data only with authorized emergency responders, site managers, and humanitarian partners wey dey follow help you.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.description: You get right to see, correct, or ask make we delete your personal data anytime through your profile settings.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: If you get questions about this policy, please contact our support team through live chat or emergency channels.

privacy.consent: As you dey use HopeLine, you agree to the terms of this Privacy Policy and our commitment to protect your data during humanitarian crises.
